title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

A day is a long time in crypto. Only 24 hours after YouTuber KSI was accused of being a pump-and-dump merchant, the boss of the project in question has come out to defend him. Plus, a coalition of banking and financial services groups in the United States have urged the SEC to update rules that could see American banks become custodians to spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds. And the Bitcoin ETFs are responsible for 75% of new investments in the asset, according to CryptoQuant.

Oliver Bell, founder of the Xcad Network, has leapt to the defense of YouTuber-turned-crypto guru KSI, who was accused of performing a pump-and-dump scam by investigator ZachXBT.

After ZachXBT shared screenshots of KSI’s X account posting about XCAD and then dumping $850,000 of the tokens in the days that followed, Bell posted a response, arguing that the YouTuber had all the rights to sell his tokens.

Read more

title: US banking groups lobby SEC for rule change to enter Bitcoin ETF market
description:
Multiple US banking groups are seeking inclusion in the Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) landscape, prompting a request for a rule change to facilitate their participation. In a Feb. 14 letter to SEC Chair Gary Gensler, a coalition comprising the Bank Policy Institute, the American Bankers Association, the Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association, and the […]

title: DeeStream (DST) presale excites gamers, as cutting edge platform sees more investment from Ethereum (ETH) & Cardano (ADA) holders
description: Ethereum (ETH) and Cardano (ADA) are firmly among the big-cap heavyweights of crypto, but they haven’t exactly come anywhere close to the exaggerated projections some overly bullish speculators are shilling.

title: VeChain Vaults 35% in a Meteoric Five-Day Surge: This Massive Announcement is Behind the Rally
